languages.text: {n}Глаза главы семейства Зауэрбэк упираются в Маражая. Кажется, сам воздух вокруг него тяжелеет. С заметным усилием Зауэрбэк возвращает взгляд в вашу сторону.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза главы семейства Зауэрбек медленно упираются в Маражая. Кажется, воздух вокруг тяжелеет, и скоро его невыносимый вес придавит самого Махария. С заметным усилием Зауэрбек возвращает взгляд в вашу сторону.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}The Sauerback patriarch's eyes are trained upon Marazhai. It seems as if the air itself has grown heavy. With visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза главы семейства Зауэрбэк упираются в Маражая. Кажется, сам воздух вокруг него тяжелеет. С заметным усилием Зауэрбэк возвращает взгляд в вашу сторону.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The head of House Sauerback's eyes are trained on Marazhai. It seems that even the air itself has grown heavy. With a visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: {n}The head of House Sauerback's eyes are trained on Marazhai. It seems that even the air itself has grown heavy. With a visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Sauerback patriarch's eyes are trained upon Marazhai. It seems as if the air itself has grown heavy. With visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Sauerback patriarch's eyes are trained upon Marazhai. It seems as if the air itself has grown heavy. With visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバック家の教父の目はマラズハイに向けられている。空気が重苦しくなったようだ。ザウアーバックが視線をあなたに戻そうと努めているのは明らかだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Sauerback patriarch's eyes are trained upon Marazhai. It seems as if the air itself has grown heavy. With visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバック家の教父の目はマラズハイに向けられている。空気が重苦しくなったようだ。ザウアーバックが視線をあなたに戻そうと努めているのは明らかだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克紧紧盯着玛拉斋，空气变得愈发沉重起来。过了一会儿，他仿佛用尽全力一般，将目光转回你的身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Sauerback patriarch's eyes are trained upon Marazhai. It seems as if the air itself has grown heavy. With visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯紧紧地盯着玛拉斋，空气变得愈发沉重起来。过了一会儿，苏尔贝克仿佛用尽全力一般，将目光转回你的身上。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Alors que le regard du patriarche de la maison Sauerback se pose sur Marazhai, l'air se fait soudain plus lourd, comme chargé d'électricité. Au bout d'un moment, et avec un effort visible, Macharius se tourne de nouveau vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Sauerback patriarch's eyes are trained upon Marazhai. It seems as if the air itself has grown heavy. With visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que le regard du patriarche de la maison Sauerback se pose sur Marazhai, l'air se fait soudain plus lourd, comme chargé d'électricité. Au bout d'un moment, et avec un effort visible, Macharius se tourne de nouveau vers vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}El patriarca de la casa Sauerback mira a Marazhai. El aire se puede cortar con un cuchillo. Con visible esfuerzo, Sauerback se vuelve hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Sauerback patriarch's eyes are trained upon Marazhai. It seems as if the air itself has grown heavy. With visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El jefe de la casa Sauerback mira a Marazhai. El aire se puede cortar con un cuchillo. Con visible esfuerzo, Sauerback se vuelve hacia ti.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Patriarchen von Haus Sauerback sind auf Marazhai gerichtet. Es scheint, als sei die Luft dick und schwer geworden. Mit sichtbarer Anstrengung richtet Sauerback seinen Blick wieder auf dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Sauerback patriarch's eyes are trained upon Marazhai. It seems as if the air itself has grown heavy. With visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Kopfs von Haus Sauerback sind auf Marazhai gerichtet. Es scheint, als sei die Luft dick und schwer geworden. Mit sichtbarer Anstrengung richtet Sauerback seinen Blick wieder auf dich.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Reis Sauerback'in gözleri, Marazhai'a kilitli. Havaya âdeta bir ağırlık çökmüş gibi. Sauerback, kendini zorlayarak bakışlarını tekrar sana çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Sauerback patriarch's eyes are trained upon Marazhai. It seems as if the air itself has grown heavy. With visible effort, Sauerback turns his gaze back to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Önder Sauerback'in gözleri Marazhai'a odaklanmış. Havaya âdeta bir ağırlık çökmüş gibi. Sauerback, kendini zorlayarak bakışlarını tekrar sana çeviriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback
